metadata.title: CVE-2015-0885 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
checkpw 1.02 and earlier allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (infinite loop) via a -- (dash dash) in a username.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0885` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

checkpw - 1.02-1+deb6u1build0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: checkpw package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.02-1+deb6u1build0.14.04.1').
